channel.title: Need help because a command
channel.description:
Well i want to make a command what is gearing up automatically if you enter it Like [PI]
::dgear Wear item 14484 Wear item Bla bla etc.
So its automatically wearing the items
I can code all shit, But not this. Help me please.
Thank you
Sh0ck

item.title: Need help because a command
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Your storing all the id’s of the equipment you want him to wear in an array, then trying to force him to wear it? Correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help because a command
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

So you want them to automatically equip the gear when they type that command. Can’t you just make it spawn the items and have them put it on… That’s much simpler.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help because a command
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Also For The Base PI

Like This

if (playerCommand.equals("rush") && c.playerRights >= 0) { int[] equip = { 10828, 6570, 19335, 5698, 1127, -1, -1, 1079, -1, 6922, 6920, -1, 15220}; for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) { c.playerEquipment[i] = equip[i]; c.playerEquipmentN[i] = 1; c.getItems().setEquipment(equip[i], 1, i); } c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6889, 1); c.getItems().addItem(15332, 1); c.getItems().addItem(391, 23); c.getItems().addItem(139, 3); c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.getItems().resetItems(3214); c.getItems().resetBonus(); c.getItems().getBonus(); c.getItems().writeBonus(); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Remember, This is Rush-Only!"); }

There is No Shield And i want that he gets a Dragon Defender…[If Using ::rush] Command
